legendText: According to tradition, in order to test the humility of the daughter-in-law, the mother-in-law throws the khlor, a small clay pot, into the red-hot oven and asks her to take it out: 'Kha'rs, khlor khan ' The bride throws herself into the toaster and burns herself. Since then, the name of the village remains Chlokhan
footerTextTwo: Website author: Aram Margaryan, Photo author: Lupe
